glyphs.name: Glyph of Fire From the Heavens

spell_tooltip.description: Lightbearer's healing transfer is increased by up to 150% based on your current health. Lower health heals allies for more.
Your Consecration clears and suppresses all snare effects on allies within its area of effect.

Your Divine Steed lasts for an additional 2 sec.

While active you become immune to movement impairing effects, and you knock back enemies that you move through.

Heals a friendly target for an amount equal to 100% your maximum health.

Cannot be used on a target with Forbearance. Causes Forbearance for 30 sec.

Learn Concentration Aura, Devotion Aura, and Crusader Aura:

Concentration Aura:
Interrupt and Silence effects on party and raid members within 40 yds are 30% shorter. 

 Devotion Aura:
Party and raid members within 40 yds are bolstered by their devotion, reducing damage taken by 3%.

 Crusader Aura:
Increases mounted speed by 20% for all party and raid members within 40 yds.

Hurls a divine hammer that strikes an enemy for 368,046 Holy damage. Only usable on enemies that have less than 20% health, or during Avenging Wrath.

Generates 1 Holy Power.
Cleanses a friendly target, removing all Poison and Disease effects.
Hammer of Justice's cooldown is reduced by 15 sec.
Emits dazzling light in all directions, blinding enemies within 10 yds, causing them to wander disoriented for 6 sec. Damage may cancel the effect.
Leap atop your Charger for 7 sec, increasing movement speed by 100%. Usable while indoors or in combat.
The cooldowns of Repentance and Blinding Light are reduced by 15 sec.

Judgment causes the target to take 40% increased damage from your next Holy Power ability.

Multiple applications may overlap.
Divine Steed now has 2 charges.
Blesses a party or raid member, granting immunity to movement impairing effects for 8 sec.
Interrupts spellcasting and prevents any spell in that school from being cast for 3 sec.
Speed increased by 2% and damage taken from area of effect attacks reduced by 2%.

Instantly cast Avenger's Shield on up to 5 targets within 30 yds.

Generates 1 Holy Power per target hit.
Blessing of Freedom increases movement speed by 30%, and you gain Blessing of Freedom when cast on a friendly target.
Armor increased by 20%, Stamina increased by 20% and damage taken from area of effect attacks reduced by 12%.

Blesses a party or raid member, reducing their damage taken by 30%, but you suffer 100% of damage prevented.

Last 12 sec, or until transferred damage would cause you to fall below 20% health.
After casting Divine Toll, you instantly cast Avenger's Shield every 5 sec for 15 sec.

Blesses a party or raid member, granting immunity to Physical damage and harmful effects for 10 sec.

Cannot be used on a target with Forbearance. Causes Forbearance for 30 sec.

Shares a cooldown with Blessing of Spellwarding.
Your Consecration is 15% larger, and enemies within it have 50% reduced movement speed.
Armor and critical strike chance increased by 4%.
Holy Power spending abilities have a 15% chance to make your next Holy Power spending ability free and deal 15% increased damage and healing.
Reduces the cooldown of your Divine Shield, Ardent Defender, and Lay on Hands by 30%.
Shield of the Righteous heals you and up to 2 nearby allies for 1.0% of maximum health.

Divine Steed reduces the cooldown of 4 nearby ally's major movement ability by 3.0 sec.

Your movement speed is increased by 3%.
Ardent Defender increases healing taken by 15% for its duration.
Shield of the Righteous grants 5% bonus armor for 4.5 sec.
Mastery increased by 4% and strength increased by 4%.
Hammer of Wrath and Judgment deal 5% additional damage and extend the duration of Avenging Wrath by 0.3 sec.
Consecration heals you and 5 allies within it for 6,135 every 0.7 sec.

When you cast 3 Holy Power generating abilities, you gain Blessing of Dawn. When you consume Blessing of Dawn, you gain Blessing of Dusk.

Blessing of Dawn
Your next Holy Power spending ability deals 30% additional increased damage and healing. This effect stacks.

Blessing of Dusk
Damage taken reduced by 4% For 10 sec.
10% of all healing done to you from other sources heals up to 4 nearby allies, divided evenly among them.

Hurls your shield at an enemy target, dealing 142,104 Holy damage, interrupting and silencing the non-Player target for 3 sec, and then jumping to 4 additional nearby enemies. 

Shields you for 8 sec, absorbing 60% as much damage as it dealt.
Your block chance is increased by 20%, you are able to block spells, and your successful blocks deal 20,766 Holy damage to your attacker.

Throws a Blessed Hammer that spirals outward, dealing 30,348 Holy damage to enemies and reducing the next damage they deal to you by 35,302.

Generates 1 Holy Power.
Shield of the Righteous increases your Strength and Stamina by 2% for 10 sec, stacking up to 3.

When you avoid a melee attack or use Blessed Hammer, you have a 15% chance to reset the remaining cooldown on Avenger's Shield.

Reduces the cooldown of Judgment by 3 sec.
Every 3 Shields of the Righteous make your next Word of Glory cost no Holy Power. Maximum 2 stacks.
Your chance to block spells is increased by 8%.

Reduces all damage you take by 30% for 8 sec.

While Ardent Defender is active, the next attack that would otherwise kill you will instead bring you to 20% of your maximum health.
When you use Avenger's Shield, your block chance is increased by 10% for 10 sec.
Consecration's benefits persist for 4.0 seconds after you leave it.
Enemies struck by Avenger's Shield burn with holy fire, suffering 151,774 Radiant damage over 5 sec.
Avenger's Shield also shields you for 8 sec, absorbing 60% as much damage as it dealt, up to 50% of your maximum health.
Ardent Defender reduces damage taken by an additional 10%.
Consecration lasts 2 sec longer and its damage is increased by 20%.
Spending Holy Power grants you 1% haste per finisher for 12 sec, stacking up to 3 times.

Call upon the Light and gain 15 stacks of Divine Resolve, increasing your maximum health by 1% and reducing your damage taken by 2% per stack for 20 sec. After 5 sec, you will begin to lose 1 stack per second, but each 3 Holy Power spent will delay the loss of your next stack by 1 sec.

While active, your Judgment generates 1 additional Holy Power, your damage and healing is increased by 20%, and Hammer of Wrath may be cast on any target.

Combines with Avenging Wrath.
Casting Word of Glory grants you an additional 15% block chance for 6 sec.
Avenger's Shield jumps to 2 additional targets.
Empowers you with the spirit of ancient kings, reducing all damage you take by 50% for 8 sec.
Judgment now has 2 charges, and Grand Crusader now also reduces the cooldown of Judgment by 3 sec.

Each enemy hit by Avenger's Shield reduces the remaining cooldown on Guardian of Ancient Kings by 1.0 sec.

When you drop below 30% health, you become infused with Guardian of Ancient Kings for 4 sec. This cannot occur again for 45 sec.
Avenging Wrath and Sentinel cause Judgment to generate 1 additional Holy Power, and have 25% increased duration.
For each target hit by Avenger's Shield, gain 3% parry for 15 sec.
Releases a blinding flash from your shield, causing 487,007 Holy damage to all nearby enemies within 8 yds and reducing all damage they deal to you by 25% for 6 sec.
Each 3 Holy Power you spend reduces the cooldown of Ardent Defender and Divine Shield by 2.0 sec.
Avenger's Shield increases the damage of your next Shield of the Righteous by 20% for each target hit by Avenger's Shield, stacking up to 5 times, and increases its radius by 6 yds.
Eye of Tyr deals 300% increased damage and has 33% reduced cooldown.
During Divine Shield, all targets within 15 yds are taunted.
Holy Power abilities reduce the remaining cooldown on Avenging Wrath and Guardian of Ancient Kings by 1.5 sec.

Eye of Tyr is replaced with Hammer of Light for 20 sec after it is cast.

 Hammer of Light:
Hammer down your enemy with the power of the Light, dealing 1.1 million Holy damage and 546,618 Holy damage up to 4 nearby enemies. 

Additionally, calls down Empyrean Hammers from the sky to strike 3 nearby enemies for 87,466 Holy damage each.

Costs 5 Holy Power.
Hammer of Light instantly calls down 2 Empyrean Hammers on your target when it is cast.
After casting Hammer of Light, you call down an Empyrean Hammer on a nearby target every 2 sec, for 8 sec.

When Empyrean Hammer critically strikes, 100% of its damage is dealt to nearby enemies.

Enemies hit by this effect deal 5% reduced damage to you for 8 sec.

Eye of Tyr surrounds you with a Holy barrier for 15% of your maximum health.

Hammer of Light heals you for 15% of your maximum health, increased by 2% for each additional target hit. Any overhealing done with this effect gets converted into a Holy barrier instead.
Crusader Strike, Hammer of Wrath and Judgment extend the duration of Shake the Heavens by 1 sec.
Divine Steed lasts 2 sec longer and increases your movement speed by an additional 30% for the first 3 sec.

Casting Judgment increases the damage of Empyrean Hammer by 10% for 10 sec.

Multiple applications may overlap.

Shield of the Righteous and Word of Glory calls down an Empyrean Hammer on a nearby enemy.

While Shake the Heavens is active, this effect calls down an additional Empyrean Hammer.

Hammer of Light grants Shield of the Righteous, erupts a Consecration beneath its target, and increases your Haste by 12% for 6 sec.

Additionally, Eye of Tyr grants 3 Holy Power.

You gain a stack of Light's Deliverance when you call down an Empyrean Hammer.

While Eye of Tyr and Hammer of Light are unavailable, you consume 60 stacks of Light's Deliverance, empowering yourself to cast Hammer of Light an additional time for free.

Heals a friendly target for an amount equal to 100% your maximum health.

Cannot be used on a target with Forbearance. Causes Forbearance for 30 sec.

Learn Concentration Aura, Devotion Aura, and Crusader Aura:

Concentration Aura:
Interrupt and Silence effects on party and raid members within 40 yds are 30% shorter. 

 Devotion Aura:
Party and raid members within 40 yds are bolstered by their devotion, reducing damage taken by 3%.

 Crusader Aura:
Increases mounted speed by 20% for all party and raid members within 40 yds.

Generates 1 Holy Power.

Hammer of Justice's cooldown is reduced by 15 sec.

Multiple applications may overlap.
Interrupts spellcasting and prevents any spell in that school from being cast for 3 sec.

Generates 1 Holy Power per target hit.
Blessing of Freedom increases movement speed by 30%, and you gain Blessing of Freedom when cast on a friendly target.
Armor increased by 20%, Stamina increased by 20% and damage taken from area of effect attacks reduced by 12%.
The radius of your auras is increased by 20 yds.

Blesses a party or raid member, reducing their damage taken by 30%, but you suffer 100% of damage prevented.

Last 12 sec, or until transferred damage would cause you to fall below 20% health.
After casting Divine Toll, you instantly cast Avenger's Shield every 5 sec for 15 sec.

Cannot be used on a target with Forbearance. Causes Forbearance for 30 sec.

Shares a cooldown with Blessing of Spellwarding.

Reduces the cooldown of your Divine Shield, Ardent Defender, and Lay on Hands by 30%.
Shield of the Righteous grants 5% bonus armor for 4.5 sec.
Mastery increased by 4% and strength increased by 4%.

Blessing of Dawn
Your next Holy Power spending ability deals 30% additional increased damage and healing. This effect stacks.

Blessing of Dusk
Damage taken reduced by 4% For 10 sec.

Shields you for 8 sec, absorbing 60% as much damage as it dealt.
Your block chance is increased by 20%, you are able to block spells, and your successful blocks deal 20,869 Holy damage to your attacker.

Throws a Blessed Hammer that spirals outward, dealing 30,696 Holy damage to enemies and reducing the next damage they deal to you by 35,302.

Generates 1 Holy Power.
Shield of the Righteous increases your Strength and Stamina by 2% for 10 sec, stacking up to 3.

When you avoid a melee attack or use Blessed Hammer, you have a 15% chance to reset the remaining cooldown on Avenger's Shield.

Reduces the cooldown of Judgment by 3 sec.

Reduces all damage you take by 30% for 8 sec.

While Ardent Defender is active, the next attack that would otherwise kill you will instead bring you to 20% of your maximum health.
When you use Avenger's Shield, your block chance is increased by 10% for 10 sec.
Avenger's Shield also shields you for 8 sec, absorbing 60% as much damage as it dealt, up to 50% of your maximum health.

Word of Glory heals for an additional 20% over 10 sec.

Increased by 100% if cast on yourself while you are afflicted by a harmful damage over time effect.
Consecration lasts 2 sec longer and its damage is increased by 20%.
Your Avenger's Shield is imbued with holy fire, causing it to deal 30,392 Holy damage to all enemies within 5 yards of each target hit.

Call upon the Light and gain 15 stacks of Divine Resolve, increasing your maximum health by 1% and reducing your damage taken by 2% per stack for 20 sec. After 5 sec, you will begin to lose 1 stack per second, but each 3 Holy Power spent will delay the loss of your next stack by 1 sec.

While active, your Judgment generates 1 additional Holy Power, your damage and healing is increased by 20%, and Hammer of Wrath may be cast on any target.

Combines with Avenging Wrath.
Casting Word of Glory grants you an additional 15% block chance for 6 sec.
Empowers you with the spirit of ancient kings, reducing all damage you take by 50% for 8 sec.
Judgment now has 2 charges, and Grand Crusader now also reduces the cooldown of Judgment by 3 sec.
Avenger's Shield jumps to 2 additional targets.

Each enemy hit by Avenger's Shield reduces the remaining cooldown on Guardian of Ancient Kings by 1.0 sec.

When you drop below 30% health, you become infused with Guardian of Ancient Kings for 4 sec. This cannot occur again for 45 sec.
For each target hit by Avenger's Shield, gain 3% parry for 15 sec.

Each 3 Holy Power you spend reduces the cooldown of Ardent Defender and Divine Shield by 2.0 sec.
Your next 5 casts of Judgment generate 2 additional Holy Power.

Eye of Tyr deals 300% increased damage and has 33% reduced cooldown.
During Divine Shield, all targets within 15 yds are taunted.

Heals a friendly target for an amount equal to 100% your maximum health.

Cannot be used on a target with Forbearance. Causes Forbearance for 30 sec.

Learn Concentration Aura, Devotion Aura, and Crusader Aura:

Concentration Aura:
Interrupt and Silence effects on party and raid members within 40 yds are 30% shorter. 

 Devotion Aura:
Party and raid members within 40 yds are bolstered by their devotion, reducing damage taken by 3%.

 Crusader Aura:
Increases mounted speed by 20% for all party and raid members within 40 yds.

Hurls a divine hammer that strikes an enemy for 371,310 Holy damage. Only usable on enemies that have less than 20% health, or during Avenging Wrath.

Generates 1 Holy Power.
Cleanse additionally removes all Disease and Poison effects.
Emits dazzling light in all directions, blinding enemies within 10 yds, causing them to wander disoriented for 6 sec. Damage may cancel the effect.
After you spend 20 Holy Power, your next Word of Glory echoes onto a nearby ally at 30% effectiveness.
Leap atop your Charger for 7 sec, increasing movement speed by 100%. Usable while indoors or in combat.
Judgment deems the target unworthy, preventing the next 171,023 damage dealt by the target.
Divine Steed now has 2 charges.

Divine Steed also grants Blessing of Freedom for 3.0 sec.

 Blessing of Freedom:
Blesses a party or raid member, granting immunity to movement impairing effects for 8 sec.
Interrupts spellcasting and prevents any spell in that school from being cast for 3 sec.
Speed increased by 2% and damage taken from area of effect attacks reduced by 2%.

Instantly cast Avenger's Shield on up to 5 targets within 30 yds.

Generates 1 Holy Power per target hit.

Blessing of Freedom increases the target's movement speed by 30%. Blessing of Protection and Blessing of Sacrifice reduce the target's damage taken by 15%. These effects linger for 8 sec after the Blessing ends.
Armor increased by 20%, Stamina increased by 20% and damage taken from area of effect attacks reduced by 12%.

Blesses a party or raid member, reducing their damage taken by 30%, but you suffer 100% of damage prevented.

Last 12 sec, or until transferred damage would cause you to fall below 20% health.
After casting Divine Toll, you instantly cast Avenger's Shield every 5 sec for 15 sec.

Blesses a party or raid member, granting immunity to Physical damage and harmful effects for 10 sec.

Cannot be used on a target with Forbearance. Causes Forbearance for 30 sec.

Shares a cooldown with Blessing of Spellwarding.
Armor and critical strike chance increased by 4%.
Reduces the cooldown of Blessing of Sacrifice by 60 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Blessing of Protection and Blessing of Spellwarding by 60 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of your Divine Shield, Ardent Defender, and Lay on Hands by 30%.
Judgment causes the next 5 successful attacks against the target to heal the attacker for 22,226.
Mastery increased by 4% and strength increased by 4%.
Your spells and abilities have a chance to cause your target to erupt in a blinding light dealing 56,688 Holy damage or healing an ally for 55,216 health.

When you cast 3 Holy Power generating abilities, you gain Blessing of Dawn. When you consume Blessing of Dawn, you gain Blessing of Dusk.

Blessing of Dawn
Your next Holy Power spending ability deals 30% additional increased damage and healing. This effect stacks.

Blessing of Dusk
Damage taken reduced by 4% For 10 sec.

Triggers a burst of Light on the target, dealing 410,713 Holy damage to an enemy, or 398,772 healing to an ally.

Generates 1 Holy Power.
Word of Glory and Light of Dawn gain up to 30% additional chance to critically strike, based on their target's current health. Lower health targets are more likely to be critically struck.
Unleashes a wave of Holy energy, healing up to 5 injured allies within a 15 yd frontal cone for 229,117.
Holy Shock now has 2 charges and it refunds 50% of its mana cost when cast on an enemy.

Empowers your chosen aura for 8 sec.

Devotion Aura: Damage reduction increased to 12%.
Mastery: Lightbringer now increases your healing based on the target's proximity to either you or your Beacon of Light, whichever is closer.
Casting Flash of Light or Holy Light grants 1 Holy Power.
Holy Shock, Holy Light, and Flash of Light critical healing increased by 20%.
Holy Light heals up to 5 targets within 12 yds for 8% of its healing.

Imbue a friendly target with a Barrier of Faith, absorbing 619,650 damage for 12 sec. For the next 24 sec, Barrier of Faith accumulates 20% of effective healing from your Flash of Light, Holy Light, or Holy Shock spells. Every 6 sec, the accumulated healing becomes an absorb shield.
Consuming Infusion of Light reduces the cooldown of Holy Shock by 1.0 sec.
Allies with Beacon of Light receive 5% less damage.
30% of Holy Shock's overhealing is converted into an absorb shield. The shield amount cannot exceed 10% of your max health.
Beacon of Light transfers an additional 5% of the amount healed.
Spending Holy Power has a 25% chance to trigger Saved by the Light's absorb effect at 33% effectiveness without activating its cooldown.
Increases the range of Light of Dawn to 40 yds.
While empowered by Infusion of Light, Flash of Light heals for an additional 20%, and Holy Light or Judgment refund 0.5% of your maximum mana.
Holy Shock and Judgment have a 8% increased critical strike chance.

Apply a Beacon of Light to your target and 4 injured allies within 30 yds for 8 sec.

All affected allies will be healed for 10% of the amount of your other healing done.

Call upon the Light to become an avatar of retribution, causing Judgment to generate 1 additional Holy Power, allowing Hammer of Wrath to be used on any target, increasing your damage, healing, and critical strike chance by 20% for 25 sec.

Releases the Light within yourself, healing 5 injured allies instantly and an injured ally every 0.7 sec for 20 sec within 40 yds for 43,499.

Allies healed also receive 12% increased healing from your Holy Light, Flash of Light, and Holy Shock spells for 12 sec.
Judgment heals you for 297,431 and its mana cost is reduced by 30%. 50% of overhealing from this effect is transferred onto 2 allies within 40 yds.

While in combat, your Holy Power spenders generate 1 stack of Awakening.

At 15 stacks of Awakening, your next Judgment deals 40% increased damage, will critically strike, and activates Avenging Wrath for 12 sec.

Imbue a friendly target with a Barrier of Faith, absorbing 619,650 damage for 12 sec. For the next 24 sec, Barrier of Faith accumulates 20% of effective healing from your Flash of Light, Holy Light, or Holy Shock spells. Every 6 sec, the accumulated healing becomes an absorb shield.

After casting Avenging Wrath, your next 2 Holy Shocks cast 2 additional times.

After casting Divine Toll, your next 2 Holy Shocks cast 2 additional times.
Holy Shock has a 12% chance to refund a charge when cast and its healing is increased by 10%.

Your auras restore 19,233 health to 3 injured allies within 20 yds every 2 sec.

While Aura Mastery is active, heals all allies within 40 yds and healing is increased by 20%.

Your Holy Shock, Flash of Light, and Holy Light spells extend the duration of Tyr's Deliverance on yourself when cast on targets affected by Tyr's Deliverance.

Holy Shock: Extends 2.0 sec.

Flash of Light: Extends 4.0 sec.

 Holy Light: Extends 8.0 sec.

Tyr's Deliverance can be extended up to a maximum of 40 sec.

Heals a friendly target for an amount equal to 100% your maximum health.

Cannot be used on a target with Forbearance. Causes Forbearance for 30 sec.

Concentration Aura:
Interrupt and Silence effects on party and raid members within 40 yds are 30% shorter. 

 Devotion Aura:
Party and raid members within 40 yds are bolstered by their devotion, reducing damage taken by 3%.

 Crusader Aura:
Increases mounted speed by 20% for all party and raid members within 40 yds.

Interrupts spellcasting and prevents any spell in that school from being cast for 3 sec.

Blesses a party or raid member, reducing their damage taken by 30%, but you suffer 100% of damage prevented.

Last 12 sec, or until transferred damage would cause you to fall below 20% health.

Blesses a party or raid member, granting immunity to Physical damage and harmful effects for 10 sec.

Cannot be used on a target with Forbearance. Causes Forbearance for 30 sec.

Shares a cooldown with Blessing of Spellwarding.
Your Consecration is 15% larger, and enemies within it have 50% reduced movement speed.
Armor and critical strike chance increased by 4%.
Reduces the cooldown of Blessing of Protection and Blessing of Spellwarding by 60 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of your Divine Shield, Ardent Defender, and Lay on Hands by 30%.

Pierce an enemy with a blade of light, dealing 452,149 Holy damage.

Generates 1 Holy Power.
